ValidationRule.description: Cannot enter a FSA Cancel Date until pending Tasks are completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNULL( FSA_Cancel_Date_Entered__c ))&& ( CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "CPR NPR Callout")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot fill out "FSA Cancel Date Entered" until the following Pending Tasks are Resolved: CPR NPR Callout, Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy, and Pending FSA Claim Filing Shutoff.
